titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of James Frederick "Jimmy" Hanley.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of James Frederick "Jimmy" Hanley.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that (1) James Frederick "Jimmy" Hanley was a talented Hoosier who provided many musical compositions that were significant during the 1920s and 1930s, especially (Back Home Again in) Indiana; and (2) he should be commemorated and remembered on the 130th anniversary of his birth for the cultural impact and significance that his compositions and music continue to have throughout the world.
